form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Stabenow (for herself, Mr. Heller, Mr. Menendez, and Mr. Isakson) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To prevent homeowners from being forced to pay taxes on forgiven mortgage loan debt.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Mortgage Forgiveness Tax Relief Act .

section.header: Extension of exclusion from gross income of discharge of qualified principal residence indebtedness

subsection.text: Subparagraph (E) of section 108(a)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking January 1, 2014 and inserting January 1, 2016.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to indebtedness discharged after December 31, 2013.
